name: auto-todo
description: A complete todo application with CRUD operations, search functionality, and robust delete handling

scripts.test: node test-delete-unit-tests.js && node search.test.js && node drag-drop.test.js
scripts.test:browser: echo 'Open test-delete-unit-tests.html, test.html, test-delete-functionality.html, and test-drag-drop-integration.html in your browser to run all tests'
scripts.test:integration: echo 'Open test-delete-functionality.html and test-drag-drop-integration.html in your browser to run integration tests'
scripts.test:drag-drop-integration: echo 'Open test-drag-drop-integration.html in your browser to run drag & drop integration tests'
scripts.start: echo 'Open index.html in your browser to run the AutoToDo application'
scripts.test:all: npm run test && echo '\nTo run browser tests, open test-delete-unit-tests.html, test.html, test-delete-functionality.html, and test-drag-drop-integration.html in your browser'

author: AutoToDo Team
